citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:05am on
17-Jan-17.
Arrived at facility and called licensee at 11:10 am. Could not leave a voice message because the licensee's phone
did not have voicemail set up. Waited in vehicle for 32 minutes and called licensee at 11:42 am. Waited in vehicle
for 14 minutes more and called licensee at 11:56 am. Left facility at 12:00 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:05am on
17-Jan-17.
Arrived at facility and called licensee at 11:10 am.  Could not leave a voice message because the licensee's phone
did not have voicemail set up.  Waited in vehicle for 32 minutes and called licensee at 11:42 am.  Waited in vehicle
for 14 minutes more and called licensee at 11:56 am.  Left facility at 12:00 pm.
